mapper.select: SELECT d.no, to_char(d.date, 'YY/MM/DD') as date, u.name, d."desc", d.order_no, d.user_no FROM diagnosis d, "user" u WHERE d.user_no=u.no AND d.order_no=#{orderNo}

SELECT d.no, to_char(d.date, 'YY/MM/DD') as date, u.name, d."desc", d.order_no, d.user_no FROM diagnosis d, "user" u, "order" o, patient p WHERE d.user_no=u.no AND o.no=d.order_no AND o.patient_no=p.no AND p.no=#{patientNo}
